description: Widow of civil rights leader Dr. Martin Luther King Jr. was laid to rest 10 years ago this week.
title: Photos: Remembering Coretta Scott King 10 years later
title_page: Photos: Remembering Coretta Scott King 10 years later
text:
1 / 10
OZIER MUHAMMAD The widow of civil rights leader Dr. Martin Luther King Jr. passed Jan. 30, 2006 and was laid to rest 10 years ago this week.
2 / 10
Some of the dignitaries that attended the Feb. 7, 2006 funeral ceremony at New Birth Missionary Church included former Atlanta Mayor Andrew Young ....
3 / 10
....and long-time U.S. Senator Ted Kennedy.
4 / 10
RIC FELD Singer Michael Bolton performed during the ceremony.
5 / 10
RENEE HANNANS HENRY Rev. Joseph Lowery smiles as he honors King with some humor, with Bishop Eddie Long in the background.
6 / 10
RENEE HANNANS HENRY Others in attendance included President George W. Bush, first lady Laura Bush, former President Bill Clinton and former first lady Hillary Clinton.
7 / 10
Renee Hannans Henry Singer-songwriter Stevie Wonder embraces Bishop Eddie Long.
8 / 10
RENEE HANNANS HENRY Among the stage participants during the funeral included Bishop Eddie Long (in white) and Bernice King, daughter of Coretta Scott King.
9 / 10
Renee Hannans Henry Mourners watch a video of Coretta Scott King during the funeral.
10 / 10
